    • Method Detail

      • setDateMode

        public void setDateMode(boolean useDDMMYY_)
        Set the mode the graph uses for displaying date strings. Default is dd/mm.
        Parameters:
        useDDMMYY_ - If true, dates will be displayed as dd/mm/yy. If false, dates will be displayed as dd/mm .
